verses.verse: In those <S%H3117>days<s%> there was no <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and in those <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1839>Danites<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> them an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>in<s%>; for unto that <S%H3117>day<s%> all their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> had not <S%H5307>fallen<s%> unto them <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> of their <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> from their <S%H7098>coasts<s%>, <S%H1121>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valour<s%>, from <S%H6881>Zorah<s%>, and from <S%H847>Eshtaol<s%>, to <S%H7270>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%>, and to <S%H2713>search<s%> it; and they <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H2713>search<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>: who when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah<s%>, they <S%H3885>lodged<s%> there. men of: Heb. sons of

When they were by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah<s%>, they <S%H5234>knew<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the young <S%H5288>man<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite<s%>: and they turned <S%H5493>in<s%> thither, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Who <S%H935>brought<s%> thee <S%H1988>hither<s%>? and what <S%H6213>makest<s%> thou in this place? and what hast thou here?
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H2090>Thus<s%> and <S%H2090>thus<s%> <S%H6213>dealeth<s%> <S%H4318>Micah<s%> with me, and hath <S%H7936>hired<s%> me, and I am his <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Ask <S%H7592>counsel<s%>, we pray thee, of <S%H430>God<s%>, that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> whether our <S%H1870>way<s%> which we <S%H1980>go<s%> shall be <S%H6743>prosperous<s%>.
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3212>Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>: <S%H5227>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is your <S%H1870>way<s%> wherein ye <S%H3212>go<s%>.

Then the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3919>Laish<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H7130>therein<s%>, how they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H983>careless<s%>, after the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of the <S%H6722>Zidonians<s%>, <S%H8252>quiet<s%> and <S%H982>secure<s%>; and there was no <S%H3423>magistrate<s%> <S%H6114><s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, that might put them to <S%H3637>shame<s%> in any <S%H1697>thing<s%>; and they were <S%H7350>far<s%> from the <S%H6722>Zidonians<s%>, and had no <S%H1697>business<s%> with any <S%H120>man<s%>. magistrate: Heb. possessor, or, heir of restraint
And they <S%H935>came<s%> unto their <S%H251>brethren<s%> to <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol<s%>: and their <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, What say ye?

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, that we may go <S%H5927>up<s%> against them: for we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and, behold, it is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>: and are ye <S%H2814>still<s%>? be not <S%H6101>slothful<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%>, and to <S%H935>enter<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.

When ye <S%H935>go<s%>, ye shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H982>secure<s%>, and to a <S%H7342>large<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>: for <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hands<s%>; a <S%H4725>place<s%> where there is no <S%H4270>want<s%> of any <S%H1697>thing<s%> that is in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And there <S%H5265>went<s%> from thence of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1839>Danites<s%>, out of <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and out of <S%H847>Eshtaol<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H2296>appointed<s%> with <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>. appointed: Heb. girded

And they went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H7157>Kirjathjearim<s%>, in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: wherefore they <S%H7121>called<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4265>Mahanehdan<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>: behold, it is <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H7157>Kirjathjearim<s%>.
And they <S%H5674>passed<s%> thence unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah<s%>.

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H1980>went<s%> to spy <S%H7270>out<s%> the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H3919>Laish<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, Do ye <S%H3045>know<s%> that there <S%H3426>is<s%> in these <S%H1004>houses<s%> an <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and <S%H8655>teraphim<s%>, and a graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, and a molten <S%H4541>image<s%>? now therefore <S%H3045>consider<s%> what ye have to <S%H6213>do<s%>.

And they <S%H5493>turned<s%> thitherward, and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the young <S%H5288>man<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite<s%>, even unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah<s%>, and <S%H7592>saluted<s%> <S%H7965><s%> him. saluted: Heb. asked him of peace

And the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H2296>appointed<s%> with their <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, which were of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, <S%H5324>stood<s%> by the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

And the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H1980>went<s%> to spy <S%H7270>out<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and came <S%H935>in<s%> thither, and <S%H3947>took<s%> the graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, and the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and the <S%H8655>teraphim<s%>, and the molten <S%H4541>image<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5324>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> with the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that were <S%H2296>appointed<s%> with <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>.

And these <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H4318>Micah's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> the carved <S%H6459>image<s%>, the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and the <S%H8655>teraphim<s%>, and the molten <S%H4541>image<s%>. Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> unto them, What <S%H6213>do<s%> ye?

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Hold thy <S%H2790>peace<s%>, <S%H7760>lay<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%> with us, and be to <S%H1961>us<s%> a <S%H1>father<s%> and a <S%H3548>priest<s%>: is it <S%H2896>better<s%> for thee to be a <S%H3548>priest<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, or that thou be a <S%H3548>priest<s%> unto a <S%H7626>tribe<s%> and a <S%H4940>family<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

And the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H3190>glad<s%>, and he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and the <S%H8655>teraphim<s%>, and the graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, and went <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
So they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H3212>departed<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> the little <S%H2945>ones<s%> and the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and the <S%H3520>carriage<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

And when they were a good <S%H7368>way<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah<s%>, the <S%H582>men<s%> that were in the <S%H1004>houses<s%> near to <S%H4318>Micah's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> were gathered <S%H2199>together<s%>, and <S%H1692>overtook<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>.

And they <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>. And they <S%H5437>turned<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4318>Micah<s%>, What aileth thee, that thou comest with such a <S%H2199>company<s%>? comest: Heb. art gathered together?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Ye have taken <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H430>gods<s%> which I <S%H6213>made<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and ye are gone <S%H3212>away<s%>: and what have I more? and what is this that ye <S%H559>say<s%> unto me, What aileth thee?

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Let not thy <S%H6963>voice<s%> be <S%H8085>heard<s%> among us, lest <S%H4751>angry<s%> <S%H5315><s%> <S%H582>fellows<s%> <S%H6293>run<s%> upon thee, and thou <S%H622>lose<s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%>, with the <S%H5315>lives<s%> of thy <S%H1004>household<s%>. angry: Heb. bitter of soul

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%>: and when <S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were too <S%H2389>strong<s%> for him, he <S%H6437>turned<s%> and went <S%H7725>back<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> the things which <S%H4318>Micah<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> which he had, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H3919>Laish<s%>, unto a <S%H5971>people<s%> that were at <S%H8252>quiet<s%> and <S%H982>secure<s%>: and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And there was no <S%H5337>deliverer<s%>, because it was <S%H7350>far<s%> from <S%H6721>Zidon<s%>, and they had no <S%H1697>business<s%> with any <S%H120>man<s%>; and it was in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> that lieth by <S%H1050>Bethrehob<s%>. And they <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein.

And they <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>, who was <S%H3205>born<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H199>howbeit<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H3919>Laish<s%> at the <S%H7223>first<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> set <S%H6965>up<s%> the graven <S%H6459>image<s%>: and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, he and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H3548>priests<s%> to the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1839>Dan<s%> until the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H1540>captivity<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And they set them <S%H7760>up<s%> <S%H4318>Micah's<s%> graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, which he <S%H6213>made<s%>, all the <S%H3117>time<s%> that the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>.
